h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses
h2_title: How to Find Yellow Loong - Chapter 4 Secret Boss
content: When you get to the other side, continue on to the grassy area, then head to the left to go up the stairs. Follow this path and the voice that has narrated each of the Loong boss encounters so far will begin again.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Loong_Dragon_Bosses.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Yellow Loong - Chapter 4 Secret Boss'.
The content is as follows:
When you get to the other side, continue on to the grassy area, then head to the left to go up the stairs. Follow this path and the voice that has narrated each of the Loong boss encounters so far will begin again.
